achievements.title: Agile Development - Sanger
achievements.content: The team I worked with at the Wellcome Sanger Institute used Scrum. I lead stand-ups (daily scrum meetings) and contributed to planning and estimation in sprint planning.

achievements.title: Microservices
achievements.content: The system we were building was based on a microservice architecture.

achievements.title: Test Driven Development
achievements.content: Used test driven development to make software. Refactor the test suites to use pytest instead of unittest.

achievements.title: Lead research into MongoDB
achievements.content: Lead team into using MongoDB by organising meetings with the database support team, and then researching MongoDB to help decide how we were going to use it

achievements.title: Web Development
achievements.content: Was part of a two person team involved in refactoring an old site made in React to meet the needs of a new client.
